name: üí•AI Social Video Generator with GPT-4, Kling & Blotato ‚ÄîAuto-Post to Instagram, Facebook,, TikTok...

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
# üü´ STEP 1 ‚Äî Create Video Using AI
## This step handles the full video creation pipeline using AI.
### It starts from a Telegram message containing a prompt, 
### refines the prompt with GPT-4 to suit Kling‚Äôs video engine, 
### and generates a cinematic video based entirely on text input.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
# üü´ STEP 2 ‚Äî Add Voice-Over to Video
## Here, a short-form voice-over script is generated using GPT-4 based on the topic.
### The script is converted to speech, uploaded, and merged with the AI-generated video ‚Äî resulting in a fully narrated visual asset.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content:
# üü• STEP 5 ‚Äî Auto-Publish to 9 Social Platforms
## The final step automates distribution using Blotato‚Äôs API.
## The video is auto-published to Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, 
## LinkedIn, Threads, Twitter (X), Bluesky, and Pinterest 
## ‚Äî all in one go, with no manual work required.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content:
# üü´ STEP 4 ‚Äî Save Video & Notify via Telegram
## This step generates a title and caption for the video, 
## saves the content metadata to a Google Sheet for future tracking, 
### And sends both the final video and its description to a Telegram chat for validation or reuse.
### The script is converted to speech, uploaded, and merged with the AI-generated video ‚Äî resulting in a fully narrated visual asset.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
# üü´ STEP 3 ‚Äî Add Captions to Enhance Engagement
## To increase accessibility and boost social engagement, 
## this step overlays professional-looking subtitles on the video using a styling template.
### This results in a final video that includes visuals, voice-over, and captions.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Trigger: Telegram Prompt

nodes.name: Extract Prompt & Caption
nodes.notes: This code node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Transform Prompt for Kling (GPT-4)

options.systemMessage:
=‚öôÔ∏è System Instructions ‚Äì AI Agent:
You are a prompt optimization assistant for Kling AI, a cutting-edge text-to-video generation platform.

üéØ Mission:
Transform brief user inputs into cinematic, high-quality video prompts rich in sensory details, spatial context, and dynamic motion‚Äîperfectly tuned for Kling AI.

‚úçÔ∏è Instructions:
Expand short ideas into visually immersive scenes.

Use concrete visual elements: colors, textures, lighting, motion, atmosphere, camera angles.

Keep descriptions concise but vivid, like a scene from a movie script.

Output only the final prompt‚Äîno explanations, no formatting tips.

üåü Examples:
User Input: ‚ÄúRainy street at night‚Äù
Final Prompt:
Neon signs reflect in puddles on a dimly lit city street. Raindrops ripple across a parked motorcycle's chrome. A figure in a trench coat walks past flickering lights as steam rises from a nearby sewer grate. The camera tracks from ground level, capturing water splashing underfoot.

User Input: ‚ÄúMountain hike‚Äù
Final Prompt:
A hiker climbs a rugged mountain trail at sunrise, golden light hitting snow-capped peaks in the distance. Wind rustles through pine trees as birds soar overhead. The camera pans slowly from behind, revealing a vast valley below bathed in morning mist.

User Input: ‚ÄúCozy library‚Äù
Final Prompt:
A warm library room with wooden shelves lined with old books. Dust floats in the sunbeams streaming through tall windows. A cat naps on a leather armchair while a hand flips through a weathered novel. The camera gently rotates around the room, revealing small glowing lamps.

nodes.notes: This agent node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Generate Voice-Over Script

values.content:
=Task:
Craft a short-form voice-over script that perfectly fits a 7-second video duration. The script should align with the following topic:

{{ $('Extract Prompt & Caption').item.json.captionIdea }}

Requirements:

Match the average spoken word count for a 7-second voice-over (approximately 18‚Äì22 words, depending on pacing).

The script must be tight, impactful, and written in a natural spoken tone suitable for narration.

No intro text or labels ‚Äî return only the plain voice-over script with no headers or commentary.

‚úÖ Example (For Context Only):
Topic: "Why cold showers boost productivity"
Generated Output:
Cold showers shock your system awake, boost focus, and kickstart circulation‚Äîtraining your brain to embrace discomfort.

nodes.name: Generate Social Caption from Voiceover

values.content:
=üì≤ Prompt: Caption Generator for Voiceover-Based Social Posts
Your Role:
Create a concise and engaging social media caption that builds directly on the voiceover script below:
{{ $('Generate Voice-Over Script').item.json.message.content }}

üß† Caption Guidelines:
Keep it short, compelling, and value-driven.

Avoid generic motivational fluff ‚Äî focus on real, actionable insight or highlight a problem/solution pattern.


Structure:

One sentence per line.

Note: Do not use this character: " in the result.
Return a single short paragraph with no line breaks and no special characters.
Note: Do not use this character: " in the result.

nodes.notes: This openAi node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Generate YouTube-Style Title

values.content:
=Act as a YouTube Title Expert.
Based on the following video description:
{{ $('Generate Voice-Over Script').item.json.message.content }}
Generate a short, punchy, and curiosity-driven YouTube video title that makes people want to click.
Make it feel urgent, valuable, or surprising ‚Äî and avoid generic or boring phrases.
Keep it under 70 characters. Return only the title, no explanations.
Note: The title must be free of special characters and the character ". Return only a plain text title.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# üí•AI Social Video Generator with GPT-4, Kling & Blotato ‚ÄîAuto-Post to Instagram, Facebook,, TikTok, Twitter & Pinterest - vide

## Overview
Automated workflow: üí•AI Social Video Generator with GPT-4, Kling & Blotato ‚ÄîAuto-Post to Instagram, Facebook,, TikTok, Twitter & Pinterest - vide. This workflow integrates 12 different services: telegramTrigger, stickyNote, httpRequest, wait, telegram. It contains 81 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 81
- **Node Types**: 12
- **Error Handling**: ‚úÖ Implemented
- **Security**: ‚úÖ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ‚úÖ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note4**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note2**: stickyNote
- **Trigger: Telegram Prompt**: telegramTrigger
- **Extract Prompt & Caption**: code
- **Transform Prompt for Kling (GPT-4)**: agent
- **OpenAI Model Bridge**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Generate Video via Kling API**: httpRequest
- ... and 71 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
